definition: earth/dust/clay/local/indigenous/crude opium/unsophisticated/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: The rain flowed into the low-lying land.
sentences.chinese: 雨水都顺着山势流到了塘坳里。

sentences.english: The basic features of the transition stage are elaborated in detail.
sentences.chinese: 详细阐述了济阳坳陷断拗转换期的基本特征。

sentences.english: The natural gas enrichment of Jurassic depression in the west of Sichuan is mainly controlled by lithofacies.
sentences.chinese: 川西坳陷侏罗系天然气富集主要受岩相控制。

sentences.english: Daxing fault in Jizhong sag is characterized with segmentation and variations for each segment.
sentences.chinese: 冀中坳陷大兴断裂具有分段性，且各段特征存在差异。

sentences.english: The Southwest Tarim Basin belongs to Southwest Depression in regional structure.
sentences.chinese: 塔里木盆地西南地区，在区域构造上属西南坳陷。

sentences.english: The reservoir diagenesis of Bazhou Depression, Minhe Basin was intense.
sentences.chinese: 民和盆地巴州坳陷储集层的成岩作用强烈。

sentences.english: The Xinglongtai area is located in the Western Sag of Liaohe Depression.
sentences.chinese: 兴隆台地区位于辽河坳陷西部凹陷。

sentences.english: Shangdu depression has the mono-faulted structural characteristics, that is west-faulting east-overlapping.
sentences.chinese: 商都坳陷具有单断式的结构特征，即西断东超。

sentences.english: Paleozoic buried hills of NW, NE trending developes well in Zhoukou depression.
sentences.chinese: 周口坳陷主要发育北西和北东向的古生界潜山。

sentences.english: In the eastern Kuche Depression, Mesozoic Cretaceous and Cenozoic Tertiary are the main depositis.
sentences.chinese: 库车坳陷东部中新生代地层主要发育白垩系和第三系。

sentences.english: Linqing depression is one of the favorable areas of coal gas exploration in Shengli oilfield.
sentences.chinese: 临清坳陷是胜利油区煤成气的有利探区之一。

sentences.english: In the Jiyang depression, the main Carboniferous-Permian hydrocarbon source rocks are coals and dark mudstones.
sentences.chinese: 济阳坳陷石炭二叠系烃源岩主要为煤和暗色泥岩。

sentences.english: Changling fault depression is located in the central depression of the South of Songliao Basin.
sentences.chinese: 长岭断陷位于松辽盆地南部的中央坳陷区。

sentences.english: The foreground of geothermal resources and the advantageous region for exploration were provided.
sentences.chinese: 指出兰州坳陷地热资源的前景和勘查有利地段。

sentences.english: They are favorable targets in the exploration of commercial oil and gaseposits in the TaiBei Depression.
sentences.chinese: 它是台北坳陷寻找工业油气的有利目的层。

sentences.english: Zhuanghai district is located in the south of neritic area in Bohai gulf.
sentences.chinese: 摘要桩海地区位于济阳坳陷渤海湾南部极浅海地区。

definition: (dialect) strip of land between hills/used in place names/also pr. [ya4]
a plain/ping, unit of area equal to approx. 3.3058 square meters (used in Japan and Taiwan)
ridge between fields/row of crops/grave mound/old variant of 壟|垄
Mashan district of Jixi city 雞西|鸡西[Ji1 xi1], Heilongjiang
Lam Tsuen (an area in Hong Kong)
